text: @realDonaldTrump The mother of all Fake News is Donald Trump.  Covid-19 will flush him and all his cohorts down the drain.  If Bloomberg really wants to see Trump defeated, he'll spend another 500 million on ads explaining how this whole house of cards was created by Trump.
